string.text: Clear Sky's specialized Nosorog mod kit

A package of armor plates and specialized components for the upgrade of a Nosorog armor, along with an upgraded helmet. Carefully selected by Novikov to be used only on a CS-6 Nosorog armor, he only offer these to particularly trusted people as a way to free him from some work (or to let disatisfied customers to downgrade their Nosorogs themselves, the ingrates).

A package of armor plates and specialized components for the upgrade of a Nosorog armor, along with an upgraded helmet. Carefully selected to allow a user to upgrade themselves a baseline nosorog into an upgraded variant.
